action.description: The underlying dotnet command to run

srcPath.description: The path to the `csproj` or `sln` file for the project

outputPath.description: This maps to the `output` param of the CLI command and is the path to where build output should be created

runtimeID.description: This maps to the `runtime` param of the CLI command

additionalArgs.description: This is a string that is added to the end of the dotnet command and can be used for any available parameters that aren't explicitly defined in the executor options

configMap.description: This is a json object used for mapping Nx configurations to values for the `configuration` param of the CLI command
